code: import{axiosInstance}from"./config";export var getBannerRequest=function getBannerRequest(){return axiosInstance.get('/banner');};export var getRecommendListRequest=function getRecommendListRequest(){return axiosInstance.get('/personalized');};export var getHotSingerListRequest=function getHotSingerListRequest(count){return axiosInstance.get("/top/artists?offset=".concat(count));};export var getSingerListRequest=function getSingerListRequest(category,alpha,count){return axiosInstance.get("/artist/list?cat=".concat(category,"&initial=").concat(alpha.toLowerCase(),"&offset=").concat(count));};export var getRankListRequest=function getRankListRequest(){return axiosInstance.get("/toplist/detail");};export var getAlbumDetailRequest=function getAlbumDetailRequest(id){return axiosInstance.get("/playlist/detail?id=".concat(id));};export var getSingerInfoRequest=function getSingerInfoRequest(id){return axiosInstance.get("/artists?id=".concat(id));};
